seller_description: Get irresistible cush for your tush with Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear. Every roll is crafted with wavy perforations that tear better, for a smooth, more enjoyable go. And each sheet of toilet paper is 2X more absorbent so you can use less (vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand). We made it MEGA in size, so you get mega value. That’s right, our Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll equals 4 regular rolls (based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue), so you’ll be running back to the store less and less. Our Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper. Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2022 dollar sales.
review: Charmin is the softest, easy wipe, thick ply. Quality and comfort. Great price. Love the big pack.
Expected_output: The provided Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper review aligns with the seller's description and visuals. The seller highlights its soft texture, enhanced absorbency, mega roll size, and septic-safe design. The buyer corroborates these claims, emphasizing its softness, thick ply, ease of use, and value for money. The seller's images effectively display the product's features, such as scalloped tear edges and thickness, which are consistent with the buyer's experience shown in the images. Both seller and buyer convey satisfaction with the product's quality and performance, and no discrepancies are evident. The buyer is highly satisfied, and the seller delivered as promised. Here, the alignment indicates no fault on either side, with the product meeting or exceeding expectations.
label: 1: Here buyer agreed with the seller
